title: Label release liners containing PCR content and unbleached fibres revealed by Ahlstrom - Packaging Europe
summary: Ahlstrom extends its Acti-V range of high-performance release liners with new products containing recycled and unbleached fibre content, intended for Pressure Sensitive Adhesive (PSA) laminates and labels. The new products, Acti-V RF Yellow and Acti-V RF Natural, are designed to reduce environmental impact and promote sustainability. Acti-V RF Yellow contains at least 15% post-consumer recycled fiber, while Acti-V RF Natural does not use any dye and is based on components estimated to allow a carbon footprint reduction of at least 15% compared to the Acti-V Yellow liner.
product_or_process: Acti-V RF Yellow and Acti-V RF Natural release liners
